attributes.action: Bring in a death sentance for the most heinus and perverted crimes like murder serious and violent rape peadophilia where it is proved beyond ALL reasonable doubt that the perpertrator committed the crime/s and when they will cause a serious danger to the law abiding public
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To free up room in prisons and to ease the cost to the tax payer the most evil and dangerouse people that have committed crimes that are simply inhuman should be quickly and effectivly be put to death

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
